name: Aww So Cube - Android
description:
Its a Normal Hyper Casual Game..... WITH A TWIST

ITS HARD... did i say hard? i mean VERY HARD

ONLY REAL GAMERS CAN CLEAR THIS.

It is a level based game with a score system as well and awesome music and art. You LIve in the life of a... u guessed it.. CUBE!

Dodge all the upcoming obstacles And Reach The End

Credits: Mel Hyuga (thats me)

(side notes: Please lower your volume before starting it and the music doesn't start unless you Collide with a obstacle)

Please download. #arcade #survival #adventure #other #horror #action #rpg #platformer #adult #multiplayer #vr #retro #roguelike #scifi #pointnclick #puzzle #shooter #sports #strategy #textadventure #altgame #analog #anime #music #hypercasual #game #AWWsoCube #awwsocube #Awwsocube #AWWSOCUBE #AWWSoCube #AwwsoCube #Cube #Cuber #4deadlycubes #cube #CUBE #CUBER #fangame
